title: Heritage Five-Star Florence Escape with Daily Breakfast & EUR50 Dining Credit
description:
Right in the thick of the city yet blissfully tucked away, this Florentine hideout sits in a sweet spot along the banks of the Arno River, where centuries-old cobblestones murmur tales and every vista invites a smile. In your room, expect a bold splash of artsy eccentricity - funky stripes and stylish touches that make your stay feel like a mini art exhibition.

Chill out in Courtyard Lounge, a breezy open-air spot wrapped in history. Then, head to Whisper Wine Bar, the go-to hangout for wine lovers that dishes out top Tuscan wines alongside slick cocktails and all-day bites. Just steps from Ponte Vecchio and the Uffizi Gallery, this retreat blends heartfelt Italian warmth with polished service and inimitable Florentine spirit that beckons you back again and again.
location_description: Anglo American Hotel Florence, Curio Collection by Hilton

title: Romantic Tuscan Escape in a Renaissance Villa
description: Discover the artistic masterpieces, elegant palaces and splendid bridges of Florence staying in a beautifully renovated villa dating back to the 14th century, Villa Tolomei Hotel & Resort. Ideally located amid the lush hills surrounding the city, just 12 minutes' drive from the magnificent Santa Maria Novella, the hotel offers you the best of both worlds. Embrace the Italian lifestyle and indulge with daily breakfast, a three-course dinner during your stay, a nightly drink per person and a welcome drink on arrival.
offer_address: Via di Santa Maria a Marignolle, 10, 50124 Firenze FI, Italy

title: Boutique Florence Hideaway with Daily Breakfast & Unlimited Spa Access
description: Savour a storied stay at Rivoli Boutique Hotel and discover an oasis of old-world hospitality deep in the heart of the historic centre of Florence. Inhabiting a restored 14th-century Franciscan cloister, the majestic hotel couldn't be better placed to discover the city's soaring Renaissance romance - savour tasty Tuscan plates celebrating local produce and traditional culinary techniques at Benedicta Restaurant, rejuvenate body and mind in the hotel’s cutting-edge heated hydromassage pool or head to the hotel’s breathtaking garden courtyard for aperitifs or espresso. When you’re ready to explore, you'll find yourself surrounded by Florence’s many delights - including the grand splendour of the iconic Piazza del Duomo, just a 10-minute wander away.

title: Charming City Break in the Heart of Florence with Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover Renaissance romance and the soaring delights of Tuscany with an escape to Grand Hotel Adriatico Florence, masterfully positioned in the heart of the city’s UNESCO World Heritage-listed historic city centre. The hotel’s unrivalled location means that you’re only a stone’s throw from the city’s must-see spots. Stroll just five minutes to reach the great Santa Maria Novella Church or continue ten minutes to the mighty collection of the Uffizi Gallery. When you return, experience market-fresh Tuscan cuisine good enough to make you sing at the onsite Opera Restaurant, drink sunset negronis at Bar Vespucci’s courtyard garden or indulge with a Swedish or holistic treatment at the onsite massage room.

With one of the few private car parks in central Florence’s Limited Traffic Zone (surcharges apply) and a round-the-clock fitness centre, Grand Hotel Adriatico Florence offers convenience and class in equal measure, all surrounded by the spectacular cityscape of the ancient city beyond.
offer_address: Via Maso Finiguerra, 9, 50123 Firenze FI, Italy

title: Newly Renovated Florence Fantasy in 18th-Century Villa with Daily Buffet Breakfast
description:
Live out your Tuscan dreams in the heart of romantic Florence and discover the ineffable charm of the ‘Jewel of the Renaissance’.

Newly renovated and housed in a breathtaking 18th-century villa, the Palazzo Montebello offers picturesque privacy and sophisticated comfort in an idyllic courtyard setting. The Palazzo Montebello is Florence at its finest, from its grand architecture and enchanting courtyard to the superb location just a short walk from the Arno River and the jaw-dropping Cathedral of Santa Maria. With daily buffet breakfast, a complimentary minibar item, and an early check-in and late checkout (subject to availability), a stay at this historic hotel is equal parts ease and elegance.
offer_address: Via Giuseppe Garibaldi, 14, 50123 Firenze FI, Italy

title: Trendy Florence Renaissance Style Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Housed in a carefully restored 16th-century palazzo, The Hoxton, Florence breathes new life into Renaissance elegance. Located near the Piazza della Libertà, this hotel features stylish rooms with locally sourced furnishings, vintage touches and windows that open to the bustling Florentine streetscape.

Beyond the hip, minimalist rooms, The Hoxton offers a rooftop terrace with panoramic city views and an outdoor courtyard that's ideal for an aperitivo. World-renowned museums like the Uffizi Gallery and hidden squares like Piazza di Santa Croce are a stone's throw away, so you can make the most of your stay in Tuscany's most celebrated city.

title: Elegant City Break in the Heart of Florence with Three-Course Tuscan Dinner
description: Escape to beautiful Florence, the capital of Italy’s Tuscany region, with a stay at NH Florence. Find yourself located just walking distance from major attractions such as the Cathedral of Santa Maria del Fiore (Duomo), Pitti Palace and Cappella Brancacci. Arrive to a welcome glass of wine or soft drink (served at the rooftop bar in summer) and enjoy daily full buffet breakfast and one three-course dinner for two with a glass of wine each.
offer_address: Piazza Vittorio Veneto, 4, 50123 Firenze FI, Italy

title: Boutique Florence Sophisticated Stay near the Duomo with Daily Breakfast & EUR60 Dining Credit
description:
Just moments from the Duomo, this boutique hotel blends artistic flair with Florentine elegance, where sculptural lighting, curated artworks and rich materials create a space that feels both refined and expressive. Settle in for a leisurely lunch at Nine Bistro or spend an evening at Daisy’s Restaurant and The Orientalist Cocktail Bar, where live music shows unfold.

The onsite spa is a destination in itself, featuring a counter-current pool, cold plunge, Chinese reflexology path and high-tech treatments. When not exploring the Uffizi or wandering artisan-filled alleys, you're perfectly placed to venture out to medieval hilltop towns like Fiesole and San Gimignano, or sip your way through the vineyards of Chianti - each an easy day trip from the city’s heritage centre.

title: Heritage Luxury Suites in the Heart of Florence with Daily Breakfast
description:
Be immersed in the culture and history of Florence with a stay at the heritage Leone Blu Suites | UNA Esperienze. Tucked away in the heart of the old town, surrounded by medieval piazzas and the Arno River, the hotel is perfectly positioned to explore the ancient architecture and artwork of this historic Italian city. All nine suites in the hotel offer a perfect balance of old-world touches, modern comfort and elegant décor: think vaulted ceilings with 18th-century frescoes, crystal chandeliers, cascading double showers and flatscreen televisions.

The World Heritage-listed city of Florence was made for exploring on foot - key attractions and top-rated restaurants are within easy walking distance. Spend days happily losing yourself among the cobbled streets, where you’ll stumble upon 15th-century palaces, art museums, imposing churches and boutique shops, fuelling up at gelaterias, pizzerias and wine bars along the way.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Wake up to a delicious **daily breakfast**
- Toast your escape with a **welcome bottle of wine**
- Enjoy an **additional bottle of wine** (two total; for stays of 3+ nights)
offer_address: Piazza Carlo Goldoni, 2, 50123 Firenze FI, Italy

title: Tranquil Florentine Elegance with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description: Discover the tranquil charm of Hotel Indigo Florence, an IHG Hotel, located in a vibrant Italian neighborhood just 10 minutes from the historic city centre. Explore the neighborhood's centuries-old history, including treasures like the Basilica of Santa Maria Novella and the world's oldest pharmacy, Officina Profumo Farmaceutica. Indulge in the best of Tuscan gastronomy at the Binomio Florence restaurant and terrace, while the lush garden with a pool invites you to enjoy breakfast or local wine.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Florence, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Via Jacopo da Diacceto, 16/20, Florence 50123, Italy

title: Elegant Five-Star Tuscan Retreat with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: Escape to the rolling hills of Tuscany with a dreamy five-star stay at COMO Castello Del Nero, a breathtaking 12th-century castle draped with Renaissance frescoes. Wake up in elegant Italian style each morning and enjoy the quintessential Tuscan scenery straight from a fairy tale. This pristine retreat is located 40 minutes from Florence and is the gateway to the region’s world-class Chianti vineyards and olive groves dotted across the hilltops. Indulge at the COMO Shambhala Retreat, where the bespoke treatments induce deep relaxation and restore balance to the mind, body and soul. Bask by the turquoise pool, before embarking on a culinary journey at the Michelin-starred La Torre restaurant, which uses local produce to enhance the authentic flavours and spirit of the region.
offer_address: Strada Spicciano 7, Barberino Tavarnelle 50028, Tuscany, Italy

vendor_name: Relais Santa Croce by Baglioni Hotels
title: Five-Star Relais & Châteaux Property in the Heart of Florence with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Experience the epitome of Italian elegance with an unforgettable stay at Relais Santa Croce by Baglioni Hotels - a Relais & Châteaux and The Leading Hotels of the World property, moments from Florence's most iconic landmarks.

Framed by a noble 18th-century palazzo, this five-star hotel places first-class facilities at your fingertips. Step through the historic facade and sip signature Italian tipples at the award-winning onsite winery, then indulge in delicious cuisine across your choice of exceptional restaurants including one of Italy's most famed eateries - Enoteca Pinchiorri - home to three Michelin stars. Wander onto the charming Florentine streets and explore a world of gourmet indulgence, from truffle hunts to wine tastings, and admire historic icons including the breathtaking Basilica of Santa Croce, the largest Franciscan church in the world, a less than five-minute stroll from your doorstep.
location_description: Relais Santa Croce by Baglioni Hotels
